heading.selectCounties: Select up to <1>{{additionalCountiesLimit}} other counties</1> in which you want to promote your business.
statementHeading: Reach more couples by widening your exposure to multiple regions! With Search Boost, your business holds one of the top positions in {{limit}} counties. Without Search Boost, your profile appears in a standard position based on your business address only.
changeHomeAdress.text: You can change your home address in
benefitsWithSearchBoost: With Search Boost, your business holds one of the top positions in up to {{locationLimit}} counties. Connect with more couples today!
